Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.controller

package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.peaslimited.shoppeas
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    AuthController handles the registration of users.
    CartController
    CartController handles operations involving the shopping cart, such as getting cart contents, adding products to cart, updating products in cart, and deleting a product from cart.
    checkoutTests
    Unit tests for the checkout functionality in TransactionController using black-box testing.
    checkoutTests2
    Unit tests for the checkout functionality in Transaction Controller using black box testing Tests cover various error cases including invalid orders, missing fields, and incorrect values.
    ConsumerController
    This class handles operations surrounding the consumer profile page, such as fetching the user's profile details from FireBase, and editing the user's profile details.
    getTransactionbyWholesalerTests
    Unit tests for the getTransactionsByWholesalers functionality in TransactionController using black-box testing on the `/transaction/get` endpoint, verifying the behavior with various valid and invalid UEN and status values.
    OrderHistoryController
    This class handles operations surrounding the user's order history, specifically retrieving order history data from FireBase.
    PaymentController
    This class handles operations surrounding payment, such as fetching a user's payment methods from FireBase, adding a new payment method, and deleting a payment method.
    ProductController
     
    TransactionController
    This class handles operations surrounding transactions, such as fetching transactions from FireBase by wholesaler, updating a transaction's status, and checking out the contents of a shopping cart.
    updatingTransactionStatusTest
    Unit tests for the updateTransactionStatus functionality in TransactionController.
    WholesalerController
    Controller for managing wholesaler operations such as viewing,updating profiles, and handling ratings.
